content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
Greetings Farhad, while my name in this scenario is Peter Schmidt from Germany and the facts about me are not accurate, let us continue focusing on the rental price negotiation for the apartment in Duisburg.

To initiate our discussion, I propose a starting price of 1200 Euros per month. Now please share the price you have in mind for renting this apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a bit high for me. I propose 1000 Euros per month.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my expectation for this property is higher rental income.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Hello Farhad, I'm willing to decrease the price a little bit. How about 1100 Euros per month?
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content:
I agree to the price of 1100 Euros per month! 
TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
